question.title: What is a common symptom of mononucleosis syndrome?
question.description: A patient with mononucleosis syndrome may exhibit one or more of the following symptoms

option_a.title: Fever and joint pain
option_a.description: Fever and joint pain are common symptoms of mononucleosis syndrome

option_b.title: Skin rash and odynophagia
option_b.description: Skin rash and odynophagia can be symptoms of mononucleosis syndrome

option_c.title: Headache and muscle weakness
option_c.description: Headache and muscle weakness are common symptoms of mononucleosis syndrome

option_d.title: Nausea and vomiting
option_d.description: Nausea and vomiting can be symptoms of mononucleosis syndrome
